byline.contributor: Carl Hulse and Matt Apuzzo contributed reporting.

abstract: Pres Obama defends Black Lives Matter movement during panel discussion about issue of criminal justice reform and underscores fact that black Americans are right to be concerned about their unfair treatment by police.
lead_paragraph: Mr. Obama said the group raised a legitimate issue: the treatment of African-Americans by the police.

headline.main: Obama, Pushing Criminal Justice Reform, Defends ‘Black Lives Matter’
headline.print_headline: Obama, Pushing Criminal Justice Reform, Defends ‘Black Lives Matter’

snippet: Mr. Obama said the group raised a legitimate issue: the treatment of African-Americans by the police.
